titles.title: Thomas W. Dortch, Jr. Congressional Gold Medal Act
Thomas W. Dortch, Jr. Congressional Gold Medal Act

To award a Congressional Gold Medal to Thomas W. Dortch, Jr., in recognition of his unique and substantial contributions across America in lifting marginalized people, communities, and institutions that continue to struggle for economic mobility, access to greater opportunities, equity, and equality for all people.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary:
Thomas W. Dortch, Jr. Congressional Gold Medal Act
This bill provides for the award of a Congressional Gold Medal to Thomas W. Dortch, Jr., in recognition of his contributions in helping marginalized people, communities, and institutions.
